title: How Pelosi's Visit to Taiwan Could Cause WWIII
description:
You had to know Nancy Pelosi would cause WWIII eventually. We explain why her trip to Taiwan might be what sets it off. Also, while states declare monkeypox a national emergency, we share one trick you can use to avoid getting it. And California is a cesspool of crime. #nancypelosi #taiwan #monkeypox
